tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_players (
    player_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    player_score INTEGER,
    player_level INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE GameSessions (
    session_id INT,
    session_name VARCHAR(255),
    game_mode VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    total_players INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_game_progress (
    progress_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    progress_percentage INT
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerProgress (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    level_progress INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Player(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES Game(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerFriends (
    player_id1 INT,
    player_id2 INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id1, player_id2),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id1) REFERENCES Player(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id2) REFERENCES Player(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ChatMessages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
